title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.15 - Rules of regulatory construction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.15 - Rules of regulatory construction

State Regulations
(a) As used in this Part: (1)
includes means including but not limited
to; (2)
may means is permitted to
or is authorized to; (3)
may not
means is not permitted to or is not authorized to; and
(4)
shall is used in the mandatory and
imperative sense. (b) In
this Part: (1)
words indicating the singular
include the plural; (2)
words
indicating the plural include the singular; and
(3)
words indicating the masculine gender
include the feminine. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
